alert.note: Alert for Dalton Highway Summits; South Slopes Of The Central Brooks Range; South Slopes Of The Eastern Brooks Range; Upper Koyukuk Valley; Yukon Flats (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 20 at 2:14PM AKST until January 21 at 2:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 45 below zero. Winds are expected to decrease early Sunday morning, which will allow improvements in conditions. * WHERE...South Slopes Of The Eastern Brooks Range, South Slopes Of The Central Brooks Range, Upper Koyukuk Valley, Dalton Highway Summits and Yukon Flats. * WHEN...Until 2 PM AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes.
info.instruction: A Wind Chill Advisory means that cold air and sustained wind speeds of 15 mph or more will create low wind chills. Frost bite and hypothermia can occur if precautions are not taken.

area.areaDesc: Dalton Highway Summits; South Slopes Of The Central Brooks Range; South Slopes Of The Eastern Brooks Range; Upper Koyukuk Valley; Yukon Flats
